mapper.select: /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-sup-sz-szp-dao-MnrOphtInrfDAO-selectOneOphtDummy */ SELECT '' as PTNO , '' as RCRD_DT , '' as OPTM_MSRM_DVSN_CD , '' as EXMN_HM , '' as MSRM_ERR_CECK_YN , 0 as MSRM_VL11 , 0 as MSRM_VL12 , 0 as MSRM_VL13 , '' as RGSD_MSRM_ERR_CECK_YN , 0 as RGSD_MSRM_VL1 , 0 as RGSD_MSRM_VL2 , 0 as RGSD_MSRM_VL3 , 0 as RGSD_MSRM_VL4 , 0 as RGSD_MSRM_VL5 , 0 as RGSD_MSRM_VL6 , '' as RGSD_VL1 , '' as RGSD_VL2 , '' as LFSD_MSRM_ERR_CECK_YN , 0 as LFSD_MSRM_VL1 , 0 as LFSD_MSRM_VL2 , 0 as LFSD_MSRM_VL3 , 0 as LFSD_MSRM_VL4 , 0 as LFSD_MSRM_VL5 , 0 as LFSD_MSRM_VL6 , '' as LFSD_VL1 , '' as LFSD_VL2 , '' as FRST_RGSR_ID , '' as FRST_RGST_IP , '' as FRST_RGST_DT , '' as LAST_UPDR_ID , '' as LAST_UPDT_IP , '' as LAST_UPDT_DT from dual
mapper.insert: /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-sup-sz-szp-dao-MnrOphtInrfDAO-insertMnrifopht */ INSERT INTO MNRIFOPHT ( PTNO /* 환자번호 */ , RCRD_DT /* 기록일시 */ , OPTM_MSRM_DVSN_CD /* 안과측정구분코드 */ , EXMN_HM /* 검사시분 */ , MSRM_ERR_CECK_YN /* 측정에러체크여부 */ , MSRM_VL11 /* 측정값 */ , MSRM_VL12 /* 측정값 */ , MSRM_VL13 /* 측정값 */ , RGSD_MSRM_ERR_CECK_YN /* 우측측정에러체크여부 */ , RGSD_MSRM_VL1 /* 우측측정값 */ , RGSD_MSRM_VL2 /* 우측측정값 */ , RGSD_MSRM_VL3 /* 우측측정값 */ , RGSD_MSRM_VL4 /* 우측측정값 */ , RGSD_MSRM_VL5 /* 우측측정값 */ , RGSD_MSRM_VL6 /* 우측측정값 */ , RGSD_VL1 /* 우측값 */ , RGSD_VL2 /* 우측값 */ , LFSD_MSRM_ERR_CECK_YN /* 좌측측정에러체크여부 */ , LFSD_MSRM_VL1 /* 좌측측정값 */ , LFSD_MSRM_VL2 /* 좌측측정값 */ , LFSD_MSRM_VL3 /* 좌측측정값 */ , LFSD_MSRM_VL4 /* 좌측측정값 */ , LFSD_MSRM_VL5 /* 좌측측정값 */ , LFSD_MSRM_VL6 /* 좌측측정값 */ , LFSD_VL1 /* 좌측값 */ , LFSD_VL2 /* 좌측값 */ , FRST_RGSR_ID /* 최초등록자ID */ , FRST_RGST_IP /* 최초등록IP */ , FRST_RGST_DT /* 최초등록일시 */ , FRST_RGST_CLNT_PRGM_ID , FRST_RGST_SRVR_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDR_ID /* 최종수정자ID */ , LAST_UPDT_IP /* 최종수정IP */ , LAST_UPDT_DT /* 최종수정일시 */ , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID ) VALUES ( #{ptno} /* 환자번호 */ , to_date(#{rcrdDt}, 'yyyymmdd') /* 기록일시 */ , #{optmMsrmDvsnCd} /* 안과측정구분코드 */ , #{exmnHm} /* 검사시분 */ , #{msrmErrCeckYn} /* 측정에러체크여부 */ , #{msrmVl11} /* 측정값 */ , #{msrmVl12} /* 측정값 */ , #{msrmVl13} /* 측정값 */ , #{rgsdMsrmErrCeckYn} /* 우측측정에러체크여부 */ , #{rgsdMsrmVl1} /* 우측측정값 */ , #{rgsdMsrmVl2} /* 우측측정값 */ , #{rgsdMsrmVl3} /* 우측측정값 */ , #{rgsdMsrmVl4} /* 우측측정값 */ , #{rgsdMsrmVl5} /* 우측측정값 */ , #{rgsdMsrmVl6} /* 우측측정값 */ , #{rgsdVl1} /* 우측값 */ , #{rgsdVl2} /* 우측값 */ , #{lfsdMsrmErrCeckYn} /* 좌측측정에러체크여부 */ , #{lfsdMsrmVl1} /* 좌측측정값 */ , #{lfsdMsrmVl2} /* 좌측측정값 */ , #{lfsdMsrmVl3} /* 좌측측정값 */ , #{lfsdMsrmVl4} /* 좌측측정값 */ , #{lfsdMsrmVl5} /* 좌측측정값 */ , #{lfsdMsrmVl6} /* 좌측측정값 */ , #{lfsdVl1} /* 좌측값 */ , #{lfsdVl2} /* 좌측값 */ , #{gvUserId} /* 최초등록자ID */ , #{gvUserIp} /* 최초등록IP */ , sysdate /* 최초등록일시 */ , 'MnrOphtInrf' , 'MnrOphtInrf' , #{gvUserId} /* 최종수정자ID */ , #{gvUserIp} /* 최종수정IP */ , sysdate /* 최종수정일시 */ , 'MnrOphtInrf' , 'MnrOphtInrf' )
mapper.update: /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-sup-sz-szp-dao-MnrOphtInrfDAO-updateMnrifopht */ UPDATE MNRIFOPHT SET PTNO = #{ptno} /* 환자번호 */ , RCRD_DT = to_date(#{rcrdDt}, 'yyyymmdd') /* 기록일시 */ , OPTM_MSRM_DVSN_CD = #{optmMsrmDvsnCd} /* 안과측정구분코드 */ , EXMN_HM = #{exmnHm} /* 검사시분 */ , MSRM_ERR_CECK_YN = #{msrmErrCeckYn} /* 측정에러체크여부 */ , MSRM_VL11 = #{msrmVl11} /* 측정값 */ , MSRM_VL12 = #{msrmVl12} /* 측정값 */ , MSRM_VL13 = #{msrmVl13} /* 측정값 */ , RGSD_MSRM_ERR_CECK_YN = #{rgsdMsrmErrCeckYn} /* 우측측정에러체크여부 */ , RGSD_MSRM_VL1 = #{rgsdMsrmVl1} /* 우측측정값 */ , RGSD_MSRM_VL2 = #{rgsdMsrmVl2} /* 우측측정값 */ , RGSD_MSRM_VL3 = #{rgsdMsrmVl3} /* 우측측정값 */ , RGSD_MSRM_VL4 = #{rgsdMsrmVl4} /* 우측측정값 */ , RGSD_MSRM_VL5 = #{rgsdMsrmVl5} /* 우측측정값 */ , RGSD_MSRM_VL6 = #{rgsdMsrmVl6} /* 우측측정값 */ , RGSD_VL1 = #{rgsdVl1} /* 우측값 */ , RGSD_VL2 = #{rgsdVl2} /* 우측값 */ , LFSD_MSRM_ERR_CECK_YN = #{lfsdMsrmErrCeckYn} /* 좌측측정에러체크여부 */ , LFSD_MSRM_VL1 = #{lfsdMsrmVl1} /* 좌측측정값 */ , LFSD_MSRM_VL2 = #{lfsdMsrmVl2} /* 좌측측정값 */ , LFSD_MSRM_VL3 = #{lfsdMsrmVl3} /* 좌측측정값 */ , LFSD_MSRM_VL4 = #{lfsdMsrmVl4} /* 좌측측정값 */ , LFSD_MSRM_VL5 = #{lfsdMsrmVl5} /* 좌측측정값 */ , LFSD_MSRM_VL6 = #{lfsdMsrmVl6} /* 좌측측정값 */ , LFSD_VL1 = #{lfsdVl1} /* 좌측값 */ , LFSD_VL2 = #{lfsdVl2} /* 좌측값 */ , FRST_RGSR_ID = #{gvUserId} /* 최초등록자ID */ , FRST_RGST_IP = #{gvUserIp} /* 최초등록IP */ , FRST_RGST_DT = sysdate /* 최초등록일시 */ , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} /* 최종수정자ID */ , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} /* 최종수정IP */ , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate /* 최종수정일시 */ WHERE PTNO = #{ptno} /* 환자번호 */ AND RCRD_DT = to_date(#{rcrdDt}, 'yyyymmdd') /* 기록일시 */ AND OPTM_MSRM_DVSN_CD = #{optmMsrmDvsnCd} /* 안과측정구분코드 */
mapper.select: /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-sup-sz-szp-dao-MnrOphtInrfDAO-selectOneMnrifopht */ SELECT PTNO FROM MNRIFOPHT WHERE PTNO = #{ptno} /* 환자번호 */ AND RCRD_DT = to_date(#{rcrdDt}, 'yyyymmdd') /* 기록일시 */ AND OPTM_MSRM_DVSN_CD = #{optmMsrmDvsnCd} /* 안과측정구분코드 */
